titles.title: To enact certain existing laws relating to domestic security as title 6, United States Code, "Domestic Security", and to make technical amendments to improve the United States Code.
To enact certain existing laws relating to domestic security as title 6, United States Code, "Domestic Security", and to make technical amendments to improve the United States Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

bill.summary: This bill restates and enacts certain existing laws relating to domestic security as title 6 of the United States Code.
